title: shasan
author: shasan
content: I am very glad and can't express my feeling as I have reached my desired level (Legendary).Thanks to all the community.Total time logged in: 195 days, 11 hours, and 22 minutes.Posts:    5397Activity:    1750Merit:    1000Position:    Copper MemberDate Registered:    February 26, 2018, 04:50:17 PMTrust:    +20 / =0 / -0Most Trusted: 103RDMost Recognized: 181STMost Earned Merit: 282NDMost Posts: 552ND

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: First, congrats shasan for now you're Legendary. Great feeling to have, and I really look forward to it in the future especially when the required activity points have been met. But there is a special thread you can use to announce this even if you are free to have the thread:Announce your rank up, merit or any achievements that makes you feel great!

comments.author: LDL
comments.body: @shasanCongratulations!Congratulations!!Congratulations!!!From today I welcome you to the forum with new rank, new enthusiasm and new form. May your every moment be filled with joy and comfort.May the forum become better with your help.

comments.author: CoinEraser
comments.body: Congratulations shasan and welcome to the legendary club!  It's good to see that you've made it. This is definitely a reason to celebrate. Enjoy this special day.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on February 19, 2023, 05:11:23 PMI am very glad and can't express my feeling as I have reached my desired level (Legendary).Thanks to all the community.~Congratulations on your well-deserved new rank, shasan! Although it took you a bit longer, it is great to see you finally achieve it!

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: You registered in February and ranked up in February. You registered in 2018, this year is 2023, that is 5 years, but it is really worth it because you are a good contributor on this forum. Congratulations.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Congratulations that you are now in the apex rank on the forum Shasan, it is a good achievement for you to get to this level, there is no more rank after this, so i hope you still enjoy the forum all the same . Thank you for giving out loans to people to sort out some of their urgent problems, cheers Legendary!

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Congratulations, you deserved to reach this rank early, but it looks like you haven't been active.It's rare to find someone who reaches this rank and has a good trust record of doing business and yet is involved in constructive discussions, congratulations.I just hope the scammers stay away from you.

comments.author: Crypto Library
comments.body: Weldon Shasan.And also Congratulations on your outstanding achievements. Your activity and achievements on the forum without being a legendary member are truly enviable and today this is also completed and you really deserve this. Enjoy your moment's cheers—and Best wishes for your future steps.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on February 19, 2023, 05:11:23 PMI am very glad and can't express my feeling as I have reached my desired level (Legendary).Thanks to all the community.Congratulations, dude; you are diligent and have a fantastic imprint on most of the forum boards. You are truly one of the distinguished members whose posts and discussions I am glad to see. You deserve this rank and the community's respect due to your good reputation and kindness.Good luck to you in what's to come

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: Congratulations my brother from another country, I am always happy seeing that someone you are next to are getting to the upper rank. Meaning whatever a man makes happy for others will surely come to him, though I don't know you in person but through your service and contribution I have known you to be a good user who strive his best to fetch out scammers.Congratulations mate, rock your new rank. I wish to be there someday sometimes.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Congratulations for the the new rank.For some reason, I have assumed you were already a Legendary member, but surely it was just my memory being bad on those details. Hope to see you (and other trustworthy members) around here for many years to come.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Hey shasan! Congratulations on ranking up; it's been so long, but it's worth the wait and effort. You deserve it.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Congratulation shasan for getting the rank that you deserved! It took a little longer than expected but you are there now and I hope you keep on contributing positively to the community as you have been doing for the last 5 years.

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Congratulations shasan, I am surprised that you were not already a legendary member based on your statistics and activity around here. Nice to see that you finally got the rank you deserve!

comments.author: Sarah Azhari
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on February 19, 2023, 05:11:23 PMI am very glad and can't express my feeling as I have reached my desired level (Legendary).Congratulations.I came here besides saying that, is just curious after looking at pictures, you have "most recognized" 181st, what is means?.And how calculate that?, and what factors are considered being "most recognized"?Best Regard,

comments.author: Xinarae*
comments.body: "Congratulations 'shasan' " Rangking up Legendary on the forum man.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: You're one of the valuable contributors to the sustainability of the forum's activities, especially for exchange and loan services. You deserve this honorary rank.Congrats shasan  Quote from: Sarah Azhari on February 20, 2023, 03:27:47 AMI came here besides saying that, is just curious after looking at pictures, you have "most recognized" 181st, what is means?.And how calculate that?, and what factors are considered being "most recognized"?Best Regard,It can also mean "most known", I think it was generated using the parameter of response or mention or something else. The more responses you get or your name is called, the higher your points in this category.cmiww.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Quote from: rat03gopoh on February 20, 2023, 03:43:53 AMQuote from: Sarah Azhari on February 20, 2023, 03:27:47 AMI came here besides saying that, is just curious after looking at pictures, you have "most recognized" 181st, what is means?.And how calculate that?, and what factors are considered being "most recognized"?It can also mean "most known", I think it was generated using the parameter of response or mention or something else. The more responses you get or your name is called, the higher your points in this category.It doesn't work like that, there's a calculation you can check it yourself on BPIP, so it has nothing to do how many people mentioned your username, but the more people leave you positive feedback, it will increase one of the parameter.Quote from: https://bpip.org/Most Recognized is calculated using:1000 - ((Activity Rank + Trust Rank + Earned Merit Rank) / 3).Anyway congratulations @shasan for reaching Legendary rank, I hope you will reach Double Legendary rank in near future
